title: Grab this incredible deal on the MacBook Air and finish your back-to-school shopping
content:
Macworld

Even with last year’s chip, the M2 MacBook Air is easily one of the best models we’ve ever tested, with an incredibly light design and speedy processor. Perhaps one of the coolest parts about this laptop, however, is its price right now, which is down to $799 at Amazon, its best yet. Usually available for $999, the MacBook Air M2 is a great choice for students or anyone else looking for a great laptop for a great price.

In our review of the M2 MacBook Air, we gave it a 4.5/5 star rating and our Editors’ Choice award. We appreciated the laptop’s big and bright displays, the superb battery life, and the decent speakers. “For most of us, the new M2 MacBook Air is all the laptop we’ll ever need,” our review reads.

This MacBook Air is strikingly thin and lightweight, weighing just 2.7 pounds. It also has a sleek and portable design that ensures you can work, play, or create anything from anywhere with ease. Its 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display brings 500 nits of brightness, so you can actually go outside and get some air while you work without having to squint at the monitor.

Using the MacBook Air M2 will feel intuitive and familiar, as it will work seamlessly with your other Apple devices. Even if this is your first Apple device, you’ll have a fun time discovering how everything works.

So go ahead and save on the MacBook Air M2 for just $799 at Amazon and grab a laptop you’ll love with top-tier performance, a great design and display, and fantastic portability.
